gist.headline: Polly gets a brain boost
gist.blurb: Our assistant Polly has upgraded to OpenAI embeddings, making her search powers sharper and her indexing faster.
gist.summary: Polly now utilizes the `text-embedding-small` model with 1536 dimensions and optimized hashing for more efficient document indexing.
gist.impact: Users will experience more accurate context retrieval and faster response times when interacting with Polly.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations Bee working alongside a cute pixel-art robot parrot (Polly) to organize glowing holographic data blocks. Represents the upgrade in sorting and understanding information (embeddings).
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the round yellow bee mascot and a small cute robot parrot sorting glowing data crystals into neat stacks. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic. Like Stardew Valley library. Nostalgic but beautiful.
